title: Why Have a Pond? Reason #4 FLOOD IRRIGATION

tasks.task: Set up and activate flood irrigation system using a valve in a food forest.
subtasks: Identify appropriate valve in the pond area.
Confirm the system's connection to the food forest's irrigation.
Turn the valve to initiate flood irrigation.
Observe the water redistribution across the food forest.
Assess the system's efficiency in delivering pond water to trees and plants.

tasks.task: Maintain a balanced ecosystem in the pond for fertilizer production.
subtasks: Monitor the pond's microorganisms and beneficial bacteria.
Evaluate nutrient contribution from fish waste and detritus.
Assess decomposing plant matter and its impact on microorganism activity.
Check overall water fertility levels in the pond.
Adjust or manage inputs (e.g., fish feed, organic matter) as needed.
